attributes.action: Knighthood for Captain Tom Moore, NHS fund raiser.
attributes.background: We ask the Govt and Her Majesty the Queen to award Captain Moore an immediate Knighthood for raising in excess of £5 million pounds to help the NHS.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
